parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

datasetStructure: One record per finding per specimen per subject

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.STUDYID

datasetVariables.description: Unique identifier for a study.
datasetVariables.label: Study Identifier
datasetVariables.name: STUDYID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.DOMAIN

datasetVariables.description: Two-character code for the domain.
datasetVariables.label: Domain Abbreviation
datasetVariables.name: DOMAIN

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.FOCID

datasetVariables.description: Identification of a focus of study-specific interest on or within a subject or specimen as defined in the protocol, for which a measurement, test, or examination was performed. An example could be a drug application site, e.g., "Injection site 1," "Biopsy site 1," "Treated site 1." the value in this variable should have inherent semantic value.
datasetVariables.label: Focus of Study-Specific Interest
datasetVariables.name: FOCID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.MASEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence number given to ensure uniqueness of subject records within a domain. May be any valid number.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: MASEQ

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.MAGRPID

datasetVariables.description: Used to tie together a block of related records in a single domain for a subject. This is not the treatment group number.
datasetVariables.label: Group Identifier
datasetVariables.name: MAGRPID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.MAREFID

datasetVariables.description: Internal or external specimen identifier. Example: 1009570101.
datasetVariables.label: Specimen Reference Identifier
datasetVariables.name: MAREFID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.MASPID

datasetVariables.description: Mass identifier such as MASS 1 or MASS A. Used when the mass was discovered during the in-life phase or during pathology and was assigned a mass identifier. The mass identification should be unique within the subject, regardless of mass location.
datasetVariables.label: Mass Identifier
datasetVariables.name: MASPID

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C89972

modelClassVariable.title: Short Name of Measurement, Test or Examination

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.MATESTCD

datasetVariables.description: Short name of the measurement, test, or examination described in MATEST. It can be used as a column name when converting a dataset from a vertical to a horizontal format. The value in MATESTCD cannot be longer than 8 characters, nor can it start with a number (e.g., "1TEST" is not valid). MATESTCD cannot contain characters other than letters, numbers, or underscores.
datasetVariables.label: Macroscopic Examination Short Name
datasetVariables.name: MATESTCD

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C89971

modelClassVariable.title: Name of Measurement, Test or Examination

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.MATEST

datasetVariables.description: Long name for MATESTCD. The value in MATEST cannot be longer than 40 characters. Extensible controlled values are Gross Pathological Examination, Clinical Signs Follow-up.
datasetVariables.label: Macroscopic Examination Name
datasetVariables.name: MATEST

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C88026

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.MABODSYS

datasetVariables.description: Body system or organ class associated with the specimen examined.
datasetVariables.label: Body System or Organ Class
datasetVariables.name: MABODSYS

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Original Units

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.MAORRES

datasetVariables.description: Text description of the findings as originally received or collected, including the base gross pathological observation and any modifiers, such as severity, origin, classification, size, color, etc.
datasetVariables.label: Result or Findings as Collected
datasetVariables.name: MAORRES

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Standard Format

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.MASTRESC

datasetVariables.description: Contains only the base gross pathological observation (e.g., ENLARGED) from MAORRES, without any modifiers. If the examination was completed and there were no findings, the value must be UNREMARKABLE.
datasetVariables.label: Standardized Result in Character Format
datasetVariables.name: MASTRESC

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66789

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.MASTAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to indicate examination not done or result is missing. Should be null if a result exists in MAORRES.
datasetVariables.label: Completion Status
datasetVariables.name: MASTAT

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.MAREASND

datasetVariables.description: Describes why MASTAT is NOT DONE. Example: Tissue not examined, Tissue Autolyzed.
datasetVariables.label: Reason Not Done
datasetVariables.name: MAREASND

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.MANAM

datasetVariables.description: Name or identifier of the laboratory or vendor that provided the test results.
datasetVariables.label: Laboratory Name
datasetVariables.name: MANAM

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C77529

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.MASPEC

datasetVariables.description: Defines the type of tissue, organ, or fluid examined. Examples: GLAND, ADRENAL; KIDNEY; VESSEL, LYMPHATIC. See also Assumption 4.b.
datasetVariables.label: Specimen Material Type
datasetVariables.name: MASPEC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.MAANTREG

datasetVariables.description: Defines the specific anatomical or biological region of a tissue, organ specimen, or the region from which the specimen was obtained, such as a section or part of what is defined in the MASPEC variable. If the anatomical region is not included in the specimen description MASPEC, it may be included in this variable. This field can be a combination of terms where needed. This field can be null if not applicable. Examples: CORTEX, MEDULLA, MUCOSA, SEROSA, ISLET, ZONA FASICULATA, ZONA RETICULARIS, CRANIAL, MEDIAN, ACCESSORY, SPINAL, LUMBAR, FRONTAL.
datasetVariables.label: Anatomical Region of Specimen
datasetVariables.name: MAANTREG

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.MASPCCND

datasetVariables.description: Free or standardized text describing the condition of the specimen. Example: AUTOLYZED.
datasetVariables.label: Specimen Condition
datasetVariables.name: MASPCCND

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.MASPCUFL

datasetVariables.description: Describes the usability of the specimen for the test. Should be "N" if the specimen is not usable; otherwise it should be null.
datasetVariables.label: Specimen Usability for the Test
datasetVariables.name: MASPCUFL

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C99073

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.MALAT

datasetVariables.description: Qualifier for laterality of the specimen within the subject for paired specimens. Examples: LEFT, RIGHT, BILATERAL.
datasetVariables.label: Specimen Laterality within Subject
datasetVariables.name: MALAT

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C99074

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.MADIR

datasetVariables.description: Qualifier for directionality of the specimen within the subject. Examples: DORSAL, PROXIMAL.
datasetVariables.label: Specimen Directionality within Subject
datasetVariables.name: MADIR

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C99075

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.MAPORTOT

datasetVariables.description: Qualifier for anatomical location or specimen further detailing the portion or totality, which means arrangement of, or apportioning of. Examples: ENTIRE, SINGLE, SEGMENT, MANY.
datasetVariables.label: Portion or Totality
datasetVariables.name: MAPORTOT

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.MAEVAL

datasetVariables.description: Role of the person who provided the evaluation. Used only for results that are subjective (i.e., assigned by a person or a group). Examples: PRINCIPAL PATHOLOGIST, PEER REVIEW, SPONSOR PATHOLOGIST.
datasetVariables.label: Evaluator
datasetVariables.name: MAEVAL

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C90000

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.MASEV

datasetVariables.description: Describes the severity or intensity of a particular finding. Examples: MILD, MODERATE, SEVERE.
datasetVariables.label: Severity
datasetVariables.name: MASEV

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.MADTHREL

datasetVariables.description: Describes the relationship of a particular finding to the death of a subject ("Y" = caused death, "N" = did not cause death, "U" = unknown). May be left null if not available.
datasetVariables.label: Relationship to Death
datasetVariables.name: MADTHREL

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.MADTC

datasetVariables.description: For a specimen collected or observed post mortem, this is the date/time of subject disposition in ISO 8601 format.
datasetVariables.label: Date/Time
datasetVariables.name: MADTC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable MA.MADY

datasetVariables.description: For a specimen collected or observed post mortem, this is the study day of subject disposition, in integer days. The algorithm for calculations must be relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC variable in the Demographics (DM) domain.
datasetVariables.label: Study Day
datasetVariables.name: MADY

description: The gross pathology findings recorded at necropsy. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, SDOMAIN, C95094, 2018-06-29)
label: Macroscopic Findings
name: MA
